titleStmt.title: A Confession of faith of the Roman Catholicks in Ireland for the refusing of which, many Protestants are persecuted, others who cannot swallow their damnable principles which are imposed on them, fly into England, and are kindly relieved by His Majesty's subjects.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Richard Janeway,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
